Home.desc: Total Freight Forwarding & Customs Brokerage Solutions Tailored for Your Business. With Extensive Experience Since 1987

About.headline: More than 35 Years of Trusted Logistics
About.description: Union Freight Forwarder has been a key player in Thailand's logistics industry since 1987. Starting from customs brokerage, we have evolved into a total logistics platform offering seamless solutions by air, sea, road and rail.
